column4: i just did "apt-get install ubuntu-desktop" rebooted and gdm won't respond to my keyboard or mouse, i luckily can use the other tty screens... help please
but i can't access gnome because it doesn't respond to my mouse or keyboard....
i've had 8.04 for about 5 days now with gnome, haven't tried kde but it's running a lot better than 8.10 was
